edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces

Interface ItemInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicArmWeapon, BasicLegWeapon, BasicWeapon, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item, Plank, PortableItem, Rifle, RifleBulletBox, Shotgun, ShotgunBulletBox, TeethIntrinsicWeapon, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.WeaponItem, ZombieClub, ZombieMace

    public interface ItemInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Ground, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean canAddtoInventory()
      called inside PlayerPickUpItemAction, only add the item to the inventory if it returns true
      default void changePlayerAttribute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
      change the actor's attribute
      default void setDrop()
      set the pickup variable in BasicWeapon to be false
      default void setPickUp()
      set the pickup variable in BasicWeapon to be true
      default void sideEffect(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor ZombieActor)
      apply side effect of the item to the actor

    • Method Detail

      • setPickUp

        default void setPickUp()
        set the pickup variable in BasicWeapon to be true

      • setDrop

        default void setDrop()
        set the pickup variable in BasicWeapon to be false

      • sideEffect

        default void sideEffect(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor ZombieActor)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        apply side effect of the item to the actor
        Parameters:
        ZombieActor - an actor
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when ZombieActor is null

      • canAddtoInventory

        default boolean canAddtoInventory()
        called inside PlayerPickUpItemAction, only add the item to the inventory if it returns true
        Returns:
        true if the item can be added to inventory, otherwise return false

      • changePlayerAttribute

        default void changePlayerAttribute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
        change the actor's attribute
        Parameters:
        actor - an actor object
